mapper.insert: insert into adminstrator (id, user_name, password, born, cellphone, status, register_time, gender, REGION_ID, EMAIL, head_img) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{born,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})

insert into adminstrator
id,
user_name,
password,

status,

REGION_ID,

head_img,

mapper.update: update adminstrator set head_img = #{headImg} where ID = #{id}
